subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lance Stephenson scored 25 points, and the host Indiana Pacers rallied from an early deficit to beat Philadelphia, 99-90, and hand the 76ers their franchise-record 21st straight loss.
snippet: Lance Stephenson scored 25 points, and the host Indiana Pacers rallied from an early deficit to beat Philadelphia, 99-90, and hand the 76ers their franchise-record 21st straight loss.
